mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_history (slip_id, user_id, role, approved_at) VALUES (#{slipId}, #{userId}, #{role}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.slip_id, a.user_id, u.name AS user_name, a.role, a.approved_at, a.created_date, a.updated_date FROM approval_history a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.slip_id = #{slipId}
